metadata.title: CVE-2023-52794 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal: intel: powerclamp: fix mismatch in get function for max_idle KASANreported this [ 444.853098] BUG: KASAN: global-out-of-bounds inparam_get_int+0x77/0x90 [ 444.853111] Read of size 4 at addrffffffffc16c9220 by task cat/2105 ... [ 444.853442] The buggy addressbelongs to the variable: [ 444.853443] max_idle+0x0/0xffffffffffffcde0[intel_powerclamp] There is a mismatch between the param_get_int and thedefinition of max_idle. Replacing param_get_int with param_get_byteresolves this issue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
